Html:
The current Simple OOXML 2.1.3678 version supports the Open XML SDK 2.0 December 2009 CTP.

Since 12 March 2010 the Open XML SDK 2.0 March 2010 release is available. When will Simple OOXML get support for this latest release?
An update will be posted in the next few days. In the meantime you should download the source code and recompile the library - changes are usually minor.

Just downloading and recompiling works fine, but a proper release should make it easier for people to use this library.

Is a new release coming soon?
New release will be posted soon.
The latest release of Simple OOXML  now works with the March 2010 SDK.
